message: Let's split it evenly to start with
You rejected my offer, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. Let's split it 50/50 to see if you'll accept this time.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time, but I'm still trying to get a good chunk of the money
You're being a bit greedy, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up yet.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I'm not giving up my advantage yet
You're really pushing your luck, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm still trying to get a good deal
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to give you the upper hand. This is my best offer so far.
